p: Cfa-miR-197 could target the 3′-UTR of the KPNA6 transcript at the position of 361–367 (5′-seed; MFE = −21.7 kcal/mol) and 4399–4405 (5′ canonical; MFE = −27.3 kcal/mol), whereas cfa-miR-215 could bind to KPNA6 at the position of 1169–1176 (5′ canonical; MFE = −22.7 kcal/mol) and 2784–2790 (5′-seed; MFE = −20.1 kcal/mol).
